name: Molten Armor
description: Molten Armor is an action tower defense game with a non-linear story in sci-fi setting! Command defenses and stop hordes of enemies! Fight on land, sea and in the skies!Decisions taken in the heat of battle will change the course of the war.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 1 GB available space
